segments.text: I see the water overflowing and it makes me really nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing so high, and that stool looks like it's going to tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is being sneaky, waiting for her cookie without the woman knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how the woman doesn't notice any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting so wet, someone could slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get in trouble when the woman finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside looks so calm and nice, it's a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to do something, but I'm not sure what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just making me really anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR
